ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 26
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe the entire basement area is safe for ae, except when the highpass guards have been dragged down. Just out of curiosity, why dont ppl set up in the
ygData.messageBody:
I believe the entire basement area is safe for ae,
except when the highpass guards have been dragged
down.

Just out of curiosity, why dont ppl set up in the
warrior and raider rooms... How do you know whose
spawns are whose, and how do you pull thru each other?

--- TommyC <ubersorcerer@...> wrote:
>
> Thank you all for the exhalent equipment ideas last
> week I went from 24th to
> 26th in 2 days fighting in High Keep.
> Now I have more questions.
> 1. In HK on my server (Rathe) there are usually 3
> groups, one lookout room
> group who pull lookout room,stairs and corner and 2
> pit groups who pull from
> ramp,raider and warrior room at once. My question
> is...Since we are not in
> the rooms is it safe to use all instrument attack in
> the area outside the
> lookout room?
> 2. Something is defiantly going on with chains..I
> was trying to
> chain/fear...it was all I could do to keep chains
> up.
>
> Pinen,
> 26th Bard of the NwN
> Rathe Shard
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been
> removed]
>
